speaker: SPEAKER_00
text: According to Jesus, the true God is three persons in one.

speaker: SPEAKER_00
text: Jesus is all three persons of the true God.

speaker: SPEAKER_00
text: People should worship God through Jesus, not instead of him or any creation.

speaker: SPEAKER_00
text: Jesus is a friend, counselor, and listener who speaks to believers in their hearts.

speaker: SPEAKER_00
text: God speaks to believers through Jesus.

speaker: SPEAKER_00
text: The relationship with God through Jesus is known by the personal relationship one has with Jesus.

speaker: SPEAKER_00
text: Muslims have a direct relationship with God without intermediaries.

speaker: SPEAKER_00
text: In Islam, believers pray directly to God without asking intermediaries to convey their prayers.
